text: Souleymane Anne (born 5 December 1997) is a footballer Mauritanian who plays as a forward for the B-team of En Avant de Guingamp and the Mauritania national football team. Anne began his early footballing career in the lower tiers of France, and was a prolific goalscorer at SMOC, Saran, Angoulême, and finally Aurillac Arpajon. ==International career== Born in France, Anne is of Mauritanian descent. Anne made his professional debut for the Mauritania national football team in a friendly 3-1 loss to Ghana on 26 March 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * Foot-National Profile * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Orléans Category:Mauritanian footballers Category:Mauritania international footballers Category:French footballers Category:French people of Mauritanian descent Category:Angoulême-Soyaux Charente players Category:Étoile Fréjus Saint- Raphaël players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:Association football forwards Category:2019 Africa Cup of Nations players
title: Souleymane Anne
